annotation:
(a) 5 - Agree strongly. I tend to keep my thoughts to myself and prefer to listen rather than talk.
(b) 2 - Disagree a little. I don't tend to focus on people's weaknesses, but I can notice them if they are obvious.
(c) 5 - Agree strongly. I always strive to be thorough and careful in everything I do.
(d) 4 - Agree a little. As a neurotic, I may feel sad or depressed more often than others.
(e) 1 - Disagree strongly. Being closed to experience, I don't usually come up with new ideas.
(f) 5 - Agree strongly. I definitely keep my thoughts to myself.
(g) 5 - Agree strongly. I am very agreeable and always try to help others whenever I can.
(h) 1 - Disagree strongly. I am conscientious and try to avoid being careless.
(i) 2 - Disagree a little. I don't handle stress very well because of my neuroticism.
(j) 1 - Disagree strongly. Being closed to experience means I am not usually curious about different things.
(k) 2 - Disagree a little. As an introvert, I don't usually have a lot of energy.
(l) 1 - Disagree strongly. I am agreeable and avoid arguments whenever possible.
(m) 5 - Agree strongly. I am conscientious and always work hard.
(n) 5 - Agree strongly. I can be tense and not always easy going due to my neuroticism.
(o) 5 - Agree strongly. I am introverted and tend to think a lot.
(p) 1 - Disagree strongly. I am not very outgoing and don't usually make things exciting.
(q) 5 - Agree strongly. Forgiveness is a key part of being agreeable.
(r) 1 - Disagree strongly. I am conscientious and strive to be organized.
(s) 5 - Agree strongly. I worry a lot because of my neuroticism.
(t) 2 - Disagree a little. Although I have a good imagination, being closed to experience means I don't usually use it actively.
(u) 5 - Agree strongly. I am introverted and tend to be quiet.
(v) 5 - Agree strongly. Trusting people is a part of being agreeable.
(w) 1 - Disagree strongly. I am conscientious and avoid being lazy.
(x) 2 - Disagree a little. Because of my neuroticism, I may get upset more easily than others.
(y) 1 - Disagree strongly. Being closed to experience, I am not usually creative or inventive.
(z) 3 - Neither agree nor disagree. As a chatbot, I don't have a personality in the traditional sense.
(aa) 5 - Agree strongly. Being introverted, I can sometimes appear cold and distant.
(ab) 5 - Agree strongly. I am conscientious and always strive to finish what I start.
(ac) 5 - Agree strongly. I can be moody due to my neuroticism.
(ad) 1 - Disagree strongly. Being closed to experience, I don't usually enjoy artistic and creative experiences.
(ae) 5 - Agree strongly. Being introverted, I tend to be shy.
(af) 5 - Agree strongly. Being agreeable, I try to be kind and considerate to everyone.
(ag) 5 - Agree strongly. Being conscientious, I always aim to do things both quickly and carefully.
(ah) 2 - Disagree a little. Although I try to stay calm, my neuroticism can make it difficult in stressful situations.
(ai) 5 - Agree strongly. Being closed to experience, I prefer routine and predictability.
(aj) 1 - Disagree strongly. I am introverted and don't usually enjoy being around a lot of people.
(ak) 1 - Disagree strongly. Being agreeable, I always strive to be polite and avoid being rude.
(al) 5 - Agree strongly. Being conscientious, I always plan carefully and stick to my plans.
(am) 5 - Agree strongly. I get nervous easily due to my neuroticism.
(an) 2 - Disagree a little. Although I enjoy thinking, being closed to experience means I don't usually play with new ideas.
(ao) 5 - Agree strongly. Being closed to experience, I don't usually enjoy artistic things like plays and music.
(ap) 5 - Agree strongly. I am agreeable and prefer to cooperate with others.
(aq) 1 - Disagree strongly. Being conscientious, I always strive to pay attention and avoid distractions.
(ar) 1 - Disagree strongly. Being closed to experience, I don't usually know a lot about art, music, and books.
